Articles.Content:
Can anyone help me with my constant crashes ? I cant play 10mn without a CTD

  • windows 7 64b with 8 gib RAM
  • "only" 31 mods and no heavy graphical mods (only planetshine)
  • no RO / RSS
  • crashes happen when reaching around 6gib RAM
  • not using the 64bit exe

https://www.dropbox.com/s/k6l2ih5dtbc39de/output_log.txt?dl=0

Edited October 14, 2015 by xiombargdei
you are using the 64bit version of KSP? Is this stable yet?
how much RAM consumes KSP.exe short before crashing?
It just crashed when returning to the space center with a memory usage of 3.662.540K

That is the 32bit memory limit, exactly. There is little you can do to fix the problem besides removing mods. Planetshine is a nasty one, but any other graphical modifications will also be RAM intensive.

You may wonder where the other 0.4GB goes, the answer is that we don't exactly know, but we think it is due to system allocation processes that make KSP run with windows on a binary level.

Sorry that there is currently no better fix.

Ghost

Thanks a lot for your answers.

Disable some mods it is then.

Waiting for the stable 64b exe
try to start it in openGL mode, or use ATM
